@JustinCentric haha, got it. im not in an office with a TV so no Oprah for me. And this was like, director/VP-level people stopping by, so i couldnt wave them off. not that i would do that if they weren't.

@JustinCentric im not complaining! sorry if it sounded that way... i have a job i like where people value my opinion... not everyone can say that! it just happened that today three people came within 10 minutes and it was funny to me.

@JustinCentric tbh i always work through lunch... sometimes if my officemate is out for the day i'll get something that could be messy and then i'll partially shut the door... but otherwise my door stays open, i guess?
@robdaemon oh god no... i mean... like... these are not dumb questions, theyre legit my job people asking me for my informed opinion questions
my solution is that im only going to take very small bites of salad now.
